channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Adds Much-Needed New Google Photos Library Features
item.description: Google Photos now lets you hide content from other apps and customize what you see.

item.title: AI Helps To Create Lab-Grown Meat
item.description: AI-based research is developing new solutions for the table.

item.title: Google Announces Much-Needed AI Protection Feature For Google Photos
